column1: Table 5.7: Salient details of Badaladeniya Wewa, Katukenda Gommana New tank and Nikaththala Wewa

column2: Tree planting and widen the reservation
column4: Extend the concrete bund to LB (L 10m, H 2m), Replace the sluice gate, lifting rod replacement, Desilting (20 perch), Construct the sluice to carry the water to nearby paddy fields, Demarcate the boundaries of the restricted forest area (50 perches) and make a fence.
